text: I finished this game recently after putting it off for so long even if I owned the game on Steam. There was something about the game's presentation that turned me away from it, but my love for metroidvanias made me install it on a whim.... and I have no regrets. The hero being a charmless male or female head probably ended up hurting this game. It's too bad because the actual game is full of futuristic retro charm which I absolutely loved. The gameplay is also really refreshing with you controlling a flying head and highjacking various bodies with unique attributes. Yeah I know, it sounds stupid and it's not trying to hide that, it really oozes with Double Fine humor. I played its ~6 hours campaign to full completion in 2 sittings so that's always a good sign that I enjoyed my time. I heard this song randomly while trying to align satellites and ended up intercepting a radio station, I immediately bobbed my head to it.
author: SupraDarky
